sp.lesraisins.memento_mori.desc: After a kill, the loadout will include some ammo with extra damage.
sp.lesraisins.firefly.desc: After inflicting a headshot kill with this weapon, it causes the target to explode and ignite additional targets
tooltip.lesraisins.the_last_word_1: It's yours, before the last flame goes out.
tooltip.lesraisins.the_last_word_2: all that needs to be said has been said.
tooltip.lesraisins.ppk20: A new generation of Russian military weapon for self-defense
tooltip.lesraisins.pp19: Bison will dominate in the end
tooltip.lesraisins.flash_shield: Long press [%s] to enable the flash to stun enemies
tooltip.lesraisins.qsz92: Semi-automatic pistol designed by China North Industries
tooltip.lesraisins.angel: If the spring breeze has the intention of pitying the flowers, can it allow me to be a teenager again
tooltip.lesraisins.aug: The first ever stockless military rifle to be officially adopted and deployed in large numbers
tooltip.lesraisins.crossbow_arrow: A crossbow arrow suitable for tactical crossbows.
tooltip.lesraisins.object_15: A small explosive crystal, usually used as a weapon in the backroom
tooltip.lesraisins.encore_1: Heals infection, one bullet at a time ......
tooltip.lesraisins.encore_2: But something doesn't seem quite right?
tooltip.lesraisins.the_first_curse_1: The Last Word... The First Curse, sister, partner.
tooltip.lesraisins.the_first_curse_2: But one was lost in battle...
tooltip.lesraisins.the_first_curse_3: Lost is also the memory of how it was forged.
tooltip.lesraisins.ace_of_spades: Covering and conceding is never an option.
tooltip.lesraisins.flintlock: Tactical flintlock: A combination of vintage and modern.
tooltip.lesraisins.flintlock_royal: Centuries have not been able to erase the luster of gold.
death.attack.lesraisins.poison: %1$s has been corrupted by toxic gases.
death.attack.lesraisins.burned: %1$s failed to put out the fire in his body.
